column3: 1. Viewing Angle: Minimum 178 degree (horizontal), Minimum 178 degree(vertical) 2. Speakers: Inbuilt two speakers, 10 W or higher. 3. Connectivity/Interfaces: The display unit should have following minimum interfaces: 1HDMI interface, 1 DVI-D port, 1 Display port, 1 USB port, 1 RJ 45 port. 4.Output port for audio output if internal speakers are not availble: Available.

5.Power: Should work on AC 220-240 V +/- 10%. 6. Rating: LED must havethe rating of 16X7 operations. 7.Accessories: AC power chord, remotecontrol, user manual, wall mount bracket, necessary cables and connectors.
